  • Uses of Money in base

    Methods in base that return Money
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Money
    Man.getMoney()
     
    Methods in base with parameters of type Money
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Man.addMoney(Money newMoney)
    This method read a Money object and add the money to the money of this man.
    Important: This method does not subtract money of the object that is passed as input parameter.
    Constructors in base with parameters of type Money
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    Man(int ID, int HP, Money money, int mapX, int mapY, int speed, String icon)
    Its it possible to change the lenght of the name by change the minName and maxName variables inside the constructor.

  • Uses of Money in main

    Methods in main that return Money
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Money
    CitizenList.actualMoney()
    This method is used on the createX(board) methods to determine how much money have the new citizens.
    Money
    CitizenList.aleatoricMoney()
    This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens with random amount of money between 1 and 100.
    Money
    CitizenList.zeroMoney()
    This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens without money.

    Money
    Blacksmith.melt(MinedGold gold)
    This method takes an object of type MinedGold to "melt" it into money.
